text: Argentina national volleyball team is the national volleyball team of Argentina. The team's best achievements are the 1982 World Championship bronze medal and the bronze medal at the 1988 Summer Olympics. == Honors == * Olympics: Bronze medal (1988) * World Championship: Bronze Medal (1982) * America's Cup: Silver medal (1998) == References == * www.feva.org.ar - Argentina Volleyball Federation (FeVA) Category:National volleyball teams Category:Sports organizations of Argentina
title: Argentina men's national volleyball team
